Test Name: Human Herpes Virus, Type 8 (HHV-8) Immunostain (Technical Component Only)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or blocks
Purpose: To detect HHV-8 antigens in FFPE tissue sections by immunostaining.
Container: Formalin-fixed, paraffin block or positively charged microscopic slide
Equipment: Microtome, tissue processing/staining instruments, incubator, microscope
